resources.string:
Manage all your expenses, online transactions and cash payments. App automatically tracks your spends when you receive a spend related SMS.
In 'Add New' tab, you can add a new expense.
In 'Set Limit' tab, set the amount you want to spend within a time period and the beginning and end dates of that period. On home screen you can view your current status ie. amount spent, days remaining and amount safe to spend.
In 'All Expenses' tab, view all your expenses in a monthly tabulated form.
In 'Offers' tab, you can view any current offers available. App reads discounts/offers recieved through SMS.
Other options include to Edit or Delete any expense.
